## Scope Declaration (required)
- [ ] dashboard
- [ ] contracts
- [ ] sdk
- [ ] docs
- [ ] repo-hygiene

> Select exactly one scope. Multi-scope PRs are blocked by CI.

## Summary
- What changed and why.

## File Scope Check
- Confirm all changed files belong to the selected scope.

## Validation
- List commands/checks run.

## Risk / Rollback
- Risk level and rollback notes.
